title: The Science of Natural Healing
author: Li Kir
description: Explore holistic approaches to healthcare and discover many nature-based treatments and methods that are both clinically proven and readily available to you.
cleaned_text: Enjoy this course and thousands of other programs with a Wondrium membership Wondrium is the premier service for people who love to learn.
